.. POPPING (260, (259, (50, '@'), (287, (1, '_coords_transform')), (4, '')))

.. $Id$  -*- rst -*-
.. pyformex reference manual --- geometry
.. CREATED WITH py2rst.py: DO NOT EDIT

.. include:: ../defines.inc
.. include:: ../links.inc

.. _sec:ref-geometry:

:mod:`geometry` --- A generic interface to the Coords transformation methods
============================================================================

.. automodule:: geometry
   :synopsis: A generic interface to the Coords transformation methods



   .. autoclass:: Geometry


      Geometry objects have the following methods:

      .. automethod:: x()
      .. automethod:: y()
      .. automethod:: z()
      .. automethod:: bbox()
      .. automethod:: center()
      .. automethod:: centroid()
      .. automethod:: sizes()
      .. automethod:: dsize()
      .. automethod:: bsphere()
      .. automethod:: distanceFromPlane(None)
      .. automethod:: distanceFromLine(None)
      .. automethod:: distanceFromPoint(None)
      .. automethod:: copy()
      .. automethod:: setCoords_inplace(coords)
      .. automethod:: setCoords_copy(coords)
      .. automethod:: scale(None)
      .. automethod:: translate(None)
      .. automethod:: rotate(None)
      .. automethod:: shear(None)
      .. automethod:: reflect(None)
      .. automethod:: affine(None)
      .. automethod:: cylindrical(None)
      .. automethod:: hyperCylindrical(None)
      .. automethod:: toCylindrical(None)
      .. automethod:: spherical(None)
      .. automethod:: superSpherical(None)
      .. automethod:: toSpherical(None)
      .. automethod:: bump(None)
      .. automethod:: bump1(None)
      .. automethod:: bump2(None)
      .. automethod:: flare(None)
      .. automethod:: map(None)
      .. automethod:: map1(None)
      .. automethod:: mapd(None)
      .. automethod:: newmap(None)
      .. automethod:: replace(None)
      .. automethod:: swapAxes(None)
      .. automethod:: rollAxes(None)
      .. automethod:: projectOnSphere(None)
      .. automethod:: projectOnCylinder(None)

   
.. moduleauthor:: pyFormex project (http://pyformex.org)

.. End
